医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
哈佛朝圣者医疗保健研究所推出了新的败血症研究中心哈佛朝圣者医疗保健研究所很荣幸宣布败血症流行病学与预防研究中心（SEPIS）成立。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/harvard-pilgrim-health-care-care-institute-launches-new-center-new-center-for-sepsis-research.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/harvard-pilgrim-health-care-care-institute-institute-new-center-new-center-for-sepsis-sepsis-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84e83b1b-294d-4f3e-be65-0E81B7433156 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:39:33 -0500 Harvard Pilgrim Health Care Institute launches new center for sepsis research
靶向PAK5可以为子宫内膜异位症提供新的治疗方法子宫内膜异位症是一种普遍的妇科疾病，其特征是子宫外子宫内膜样组织的生长，导致受影响妇女的严重疼痛和不育症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/targeting-pak5-could-could-offer-new-therapeutic-pherapeutic-apphack-for-for-endomortiorpis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/targeting-pak5-could-could-offer-new-therapeutic-pherapeutic-apphack-for-for-endomertiasis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e9e9e9e9f3ccb-574E-4DAA-98DB-D6913CA88898B Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:38:25 -0500 Targeting PAK5 could offer new therapeutic approach for endometriosis
机器学习工具预测基于基因突变的癌症治疗反应由USC计算机科学助理教授Ruishan Liu领导的一项开创性的研究发现了特定的基因突变如何影响癌症治疗结果的影响，这可以帮助医生更有效地量身定制治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/machine-learning-tool-predicts-cancer-warteatment-reatment-response-基于基于基因 - 基因 - saspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/machine-learning-tool-predicts-cancer-warteatment-treatment-response-基于基于基因 - 基因 - 基因 - saspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=64e9b87e-fcad-447b-8746-a4b661e5809d Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:31:54 -0500 Machine learning tool predicts cancer treatment response based on genetic mutations
肠道菌群预测对常见食物添加剂敏感性的关键食品行业广泛使用的乳化剂（一种食品添加剂）都在许多日常食品（切成薄片的面包，冰淇淋，奶油，奶油奶油，植物奶中等）中发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/gut-microbiota-key-key-to predicting-sensitivity-to-common-food-food-additives.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/gut-microbiota-key-to-predicting-sensitivity-common-common-food-additives.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=AF65FB3A-247E-485B-B87B-B87B-B87B-2B88898421518 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:29:05 -0500 Gut microbiota key to predicting sensitivity to common food additives
加州大学洛杉矶分校的研究揭示了不匹配修复基因在亨廷顿病中的关键作用一项新的UCLA健康研究在小鼠模型中发现，与修复不匹配的DNA相关的基因对于引起对亨廷顿氏病最容易受到伤害的神经元的损害至关重要疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/ucla-study-reveals-key-reveals-key-role-f-mismatch-repair-repair-genes-in-huntingtone28099s-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/ucla-study-reveals-key-reveals-key-role-of-mismatch-repair-repair-genes-nhuntingtone28099s-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54077EB1-74DF-4945-81CC-74E390C86E7B Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:25:53 -0500 UCLA study reveals key role of mismatch repair genes in Huntington’s disease
新的指南敦促将氯胺酮用于心理健康治疗麻醉氯胺酮被誉为对创伤后应激障碍（PTSD），耐药性抑郁症和其他情绪障碍患者的突破疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/new-guidelines-urge-caute-with-with-ketamine-use-for-mental-mental-health-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/new-guidelines-urge-caute-with-with-ketamine-use-for-mental-mental-health-health-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3be6fbd-e3fe-42df-42df-ae6e-c41eb0984cd4 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:23:48 -0500 New guidelines urge caution with ketamine use for mental health treatment
科学家发现内含子在细胞中的功能作用科学家发现，一些被认为是垃圾的RNA的细分段相反，在抑制某些Messenger RNA的产生中具有功能性的作用，并且似乎可以帮助细胞应对氧化应激。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/scientists-discover-discover-functional-role-of-introns-introns-in-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/scientists-discover-functional-functional-role-of-introns-introns-in-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6d83A0C7-2D8A-4DAF-8430-3A1D3CC11A23 Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:19:20 -0500 Scientists discover functional role of introns in cells
老年人经历更大的幸福和目的19老年人比在19日大流行之前拥有更大的一般幸福感，生活满意度和目标感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/older-Adults-experience-greater-happiness-happiness-and-purpose-purpose-purpose-covid-covid-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/older-Adults-ecperience-greater-happiness-happiness-and-purpose-purpose-purpose-covid-covid-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9E25D090-3B32-40FA-BC12-65559DC0DC4B Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:16:13 -0500 Older adults experience greater happiness and purpose after Covid-19
新项目旨在通过污水测量尼古丁的使用加利福尼亚大学，默塞德大学的尼古丁和大麻政策中心与大学的研究人员建立了创新的合作伙伴关系，他们跟踪整个社区的健康和习惯，并习惯了人类污水的样本。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/new-project-aims-to-measure-nicotine-use-use-through-sewage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/new-project-aims-to-measure-nicotine-use-use-through-sewage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db596f68-b18f-4448-979f-ab4f-ab4f-ab4f9d23385f Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:13:14 -0500 New Project Aims to Measure Nicotine Use Through Sewage
对烟的限制性较小，可以改善公共卫生结果昆士兰州大学的研究人员发现，在新西兰，吸烟率的下降速度是澳大利亚的两倍，这表明对烟雾的限制性监管较少可以改善公共卫生结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/less-restrictive-regulative-nogulative-on-vaping-could-imbrove-public-health-health-compomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250211/less-restrictive-reculative-on-on-vaping-could-improve-public-health-health-compomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=79840CE5-2653-49D7-9BAE-D531F531FD4DC22F Tue, 11 Feb 2025 21:10:09 -0500 Less restrictive regulation on vaping could improve public health outcomes
